nodes.bodyText: Ok - but as I look at this, I wonder if String.format should be used as being a bit clearer, I've decided that it's just longer, but I wish we'd get rid of all the string contraction.

         "ja",

-        "gs://" + PROJECT_ID + "/BATCH_TRANSLATION_OUTPUT/",
+        "gs://" + PROJECT_ID + "/" + PREFIX_PATH,
